means: 乱砍（mangle的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的身体被压得血肉模糊，根本无法辨认。

sentence.Network_en: His hand was mangled in the machine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手卷到机器里轧烂了。

sentence.Network_en: He was off work because he'd mangled his hand in a machine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没上班,因为他的手给机器严重压伤了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I mangled to get the BlackBerry Enterprise server installed., 我疥癣争取黑莓企业伺候器安装.
I want to see mangled corpses that have suffered unspeakable brutality ., 我要看到受过无法言喻的酷刑的惨不忍睹的僵尸.
"mangled"怎么说合适-翻译"mangled"... ... Mangled Corpse 尸体碎片; mangled 被损坏的; mangled injury 碾压伤; 释义：碾压伤.
She put a dressing on the mangled toe ., 她包扎砍伤的脚趾.

list.abs: mangle 压延机mangled hessian 轧光麻袋布mangler 砑光机
航海及海运专业术语P(4) ... plate loss 板耗 plate mangle 平板机 plate metal 板金属.
mangetout 嫩豌豆mangle dryer 链式干燥器mangle 压延机
进出口专业英语词汇(P1) ... padding machine 打底机 padding mangle 轧染机 padding 垫料.

entry.def: If a physical object is mangled, it is crushed or twisted very forcefully, so that it is difficult to see what its original shape was.

example.ex: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.
example.tran: 他的身体被压得血肉模糊，根本无法辨认。

entry.tran: （因发音、书写错误或表达不清晰而）扭曲，改变（词语、信息的意思）
entry.def: If you say that someone mangles words or information, you are criticizing them for not speaking or writing clearly or correctly.

example.ex: There is almost no phrase so simple that he cannot mangle it...
example.tran: 几乎再简单的话他也表达不清。

example.ex: They don't know what they're talking about and mangle scientific information.
example.tran: 他们不知所云，把科学知识讲得错误百出。

entry.tran: (旧时由两个木制滚筒辗压衣服的）轧干机，脱水机
entry.def: A mangle is an old-fashioned machine for removing water from clothes that have been washed. The clothes are squeezed between two wooden cylinders.

means.word_mean: 1. having edges that are jagged from injury
